function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Proliferation of digitally connected iot devices in smart cities can lead to an increased risk of contagious diseases spreading through these devices.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data harvesting from citizens, devices, and assets in smart cities can lead to privacy and security risks, including the potential exposure of sensitive personal information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consistency in the definition of \\\\u2019smart cities\\\\u2019 can lead to uncertainty and confusion in the implementation of smart city technologies and strategies, potentially hindering effective governance and urban development.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased connectivity and communication may lead to faster propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased connectivity and interaction in smart cities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of technological infrastructure for internet connectivity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on private corporations for smart city development","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased population density in urban areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on new technologies and digital platforms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited community engagement and participation","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid technological innovation in response to covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Surveillance and monitoring by corporations and governance entities","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global cooperation and governance challenges in the face of corporate influence","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relocalised centres and decentralized work environments may lead to increased population density in these areas, posing a risk of contagion and rapid disease spread.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on iot platforms and smart devices for data connectivity creates a potential security risk, as these systems are vulnerable to cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of non-car movements and micro-mobility may lead to challenges in maintaining hygiene and sanitation in public transportation systems, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized framework for iot device implementation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monopolistic introduction of unique iot devices by corporations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expensive infrastructure investment due to multiple device platforms","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unavailability of supportive technological infrastructure, including network connectivity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High implementation costs leading to abandonment or refocusing of the smart city pursuit","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited wireless communication leading to expensive infrastructural costs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited network and database setups for smart cities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on skewed data for decision-making","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependency on quality network for smart city sustainability","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Introduction of 6g technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of wireless technology installation and application due to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Major shift to at-home work and self-isolated society in developed countries","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased domestic internet use leading to potential spread of contagious diseases through shared devices and networks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Major decline in fixed office internet access leading to increased reliance on shared public wi-fi networks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of 5g and potential future transition to 6g increasing connectivity and data transfer speeds.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through increased interaction between iot devices and humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and resistance to iot-based data collection for healthcare monitoring","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on ai technology for health data analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased movement and interaction of people and wildlife as a result of optimized location awareness and autonomous transportation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine and remote healthcare services facilitated by 6g technology could result in potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities and data privacy risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of intelligent wearable devices iwd and remote healthcare technologies powered by 6g may lead to challenges in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of health data collected from individuals.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to physical contact and use of paper-based identity systems.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequitable access to digital services and technologies, exacerbating urban inequalities and infrastructure issues.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on traditional behavioral aspects and lack of adoption of contactless technologies leading to continued risk of disease transmission and reduced pandemic containment efforts.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to internet and digital solutions in least developed countries ldcs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented interest and increase in wearable devices and smart body implants","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Massive availability and utilization of data in urban environments through 6g technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through urban areas due to rapid population growth and increased global connectivity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to increased use of virtual reality technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical presence in real-time operations may lead to delayed or inadequate response to health and safety hazards","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Obsolete hardware and software in the past may have lacked proper infection control measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote operation and monitoring may lead to increased risk of contagion spread if proper health and safety measures are not implemented","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity to fragile or toxic ores and chemicals can pose health risks in the absence of proper monitoring and control","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased urban density and the use of digital replicas in smart cities may impact public health and safety","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
